name: List
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Metric
List
description: Metric::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Metric
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Metric
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: next?
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Metric
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of metrics.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging"

logging = Google::Cloud::Logging.new

metrics = logging.metrics
if metrics.next?
  next_metrics = metrics.next
end

require "google/cloud/logging"

logging = Google::Cloud::Logging.new

metrics = dataset.metrics
if metrics.next?
  next_metrics = metrics.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Metric
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all metrics by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each metric, which is passed as the parameter.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method may make several API calls until all metrics are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each metric by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging"

logging = Google::Cloud::Logging.new
metrics = logging.metrics

metrics.all do |metric|
  puts "#{metric.name}: #{metric.filter}"
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging"

logging = Google::Cloud::Logging.new
metrics = logging.metrics

all_names = metrics.all.map do |metric|
  metric.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging"

logging = Google::Cloud::Logging.new
metrics = logging.metrics

metrics.all(request_limit: 10) do |metric|
  puts "#{metric.name}: #{metric.filter}"
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to
make to load all metrics. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each metric.
